assertion.name: Ethics

title: Experimental Observation of BCS Dynamical Phases in a Strontium Cavity-QED System

abstract: <jats:p>We simulate out-of-equilibrium dynamics in Bardeen-Cooper-Schrieffer model of superconductivity using ~10<jats:sup>6</jats:sup> Sr atoms coupled via cavity-mediated spin-exchange inter-actions. In doing so, we observe three theoretically-predicted dynamical phases and identify corresponding phase transitions.</jats:p>
title: Experimental Observation of BCS Dynamical Phases in a Strontium Cavity-QED System

abstract: <jats:p>We experimentally demonstrate all three predicted dynamical phases of quenched superconductors using strontium atoms coupled to a high-finesse cavity. We show that this rich phenomenology can also be observed with a similar but different Hamiltonian.</jats:p>
title: Cavity QED as a Platform for Simulating Dynamical Phases of Quenched Superconductors
